ygData.subject: Re: The bum and the hole...
ygData.msgSnippet: Grimlock missed, landing with a thud behind Branded, she pushed her throttle to the limit as she swerved around corners and sped down underground slums.

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Grimlock missed, landing with a thud behind Branded, she pushed her throttle
to the limit as she swerved around corners and sped down underground slums.
Finally she decided to take a stand. The female bot spun 180 degrees and
transformed.

Hearing the commotion dozens of decrepid rusted, beat up bots slowly emerged
from cheaply built folded scrap coverings to see what the fuss was about.

Branded stood tough aiming her single flamethrower at Grimlock. Low as she
was on energy she wasn't sure how long she'd last but she was sure that she
wasn't going to die a cowards death. "Come on you slagging excuse for a
toaster oven. (I blanked and couldn't think of a better insult.)
----- Original Message -----
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 4:30 PM
Subject: Re: The bum and the hole...


> Grimlock kept chasing the car furiously growling, ignoring Pacifix. He
> coiled his powerful legs together, and launched himself forward, just
> over the magma, and hopefully onto the vehicle, wanting to bring down
> his 20 foot frame.
